text: Ingrid Elena Cruz Toro (born 1 July 1975 in Antofagasta) is a Chilean actress. == Filmography == === Cinema === Movies Year Title Role Director 2003 El Nominado Inés Gabriel López 2013 VideoClub Wanda Pablo Illanes Barrio Universitario Esteban Vidal El vuelo del Manutara === Television === ==== Telenovelas ==== Telenovelas Year Title Role Channel 1998 Marparaíso Sofía Carrasco Canal 13 1999 Cerro Alegre Karina Astudillo Canal 13 2001 Corazón Pirata Cynthia Cáceres Canal 13 2003 Machos Belén Cruchaga Canal 13 2004 Hippie Catalina Villalobos 2005 Brujas Gretel Schmidt Canal 13 2006 Descarado Caroline Martínez 2007-2008 Lola Grace Fernández 2009 Cuenta Conmigo Lídia Peña 2011 Esperanza Beatriz Solovera TVN 2012 Reserva de Familia Ema Ruiz- Tagle 2013 Los Carmona Isabel Durán == Sources == == Other websites == Category:1975 births Category:People from Antofagasta Region Category:Living people Category:Chilean movie actors Category:Chilean television actors Category:Chilean stage actors
title: Ingrid Cruz
